type: Maintenance and Support of Sharegate for NRCC
short_summary: The department is looking for ITS Product Functional Support team, which responds to user requests from MDM capability. This contract is to provide maintenance and support for Sharegate data
description: The department  is looking to obtain maintenance and support of E-Studio
full_summary:
##### Maintenance and Support of Sharegate for NRCC

**Solicitation Details**

| **Field**      | **Value**                                     | **Date**                |
| -------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| Solicitation Number | BPM020092/24535          | 2023-11-21              |
| Closing Date     | 2023-11-30T14:00:00   |                         |
| Contact Info     | Clara Whittaker          | 343-553-8354            |
|                |                                            |
| Description      | Solicitation for maintenance and support    |                      |
|                  | of Sharegate and its related technical      |                      |
|                  | specifications.                              |                      |

Required Goods/Services:
The Government intends to purchase maintenance and support for Sharegate, a software application used for managing collaborative workspace.

Contract End Users:
Shared Services Canada (SSC) in the National Capital Region (NCR), with the possibility of extending the contract to other end-users in Ontario (except NCR).

Trade Agreements:
This solicitation is listed under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Regions of Opportunity:
National Capital Region (NCR).

Regions of Delivery:
Ontario (except NCR).

Contracting Entity Details:
**Shared Services Canada**

Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada.

**Contact Information**

Name: Clara Whittaker
Email: (None)
Phone: 343-553-8354
Fax: 343-553-8354
Address: 180 Kent Street, National Capital Region, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0B6, Canada.

Portals and Attachments:
The solicitation documents can be accessed through the Supplier and Procurement Division's (SPC) portal at [Supplier Portal (Restricted Access)](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login). The attachments include Amendment 01 for the license key and Amendment 02 for the end user.
Attachments:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/F406CB1E-18F8-4094-891E-259F15B0FDBF
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/2097FA6B-35CF-442E-A385-9673CE29AA
